sermons.title: Hello World!
sermons.description: This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to his will, he hears us. (1 John 5:14)
sermons.speaker: Speaker Ivanov

sermons.title: Christian Home and Marriage Week And something else to make it a long title
sermons.description: Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her. (Ephesians 5:25)
sermons.speaker: Speaker Petrov
